channel.title: CVE Feed for General Electric -- Digital Industrial Gateway Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for General Electric -- Digital Industrial Gateway Server

item.title: CVE-2023-0755|2023-02-23T21:23:19.210Z -- general%20electric -- digital%20industrial%20gateway%20server
item.description: The affected products are vulnerable to an improper validation of array index, which could allow an attacker to crash the server and remotely execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-0754|2023-02-23T21:27:09.964Z -- general%20electric -- digital%20industrial%20gateway%20server
item.description: The affected products are vulnerable to an integer overflow or wraparound, which could Â allow an attacker to crash the server and remotely execute arbitrary code.
